trans-unit.source: Defines a command that implements <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> and is routed through the element tree.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" />를 구현하고 요소 트리를 통해 라우트되는 명령을 정의합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> methods on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> do not contain the application logic for the command as is the case with a typical <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>, but rather, these methods raise events that traverse the element tree looking for an object with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> 에 대 한 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> 는 일반적인 경우 처럼 명령에 대 한 응용 프로그램 논리가 포함 되어 있지 않으면 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>, 하지만 이러한 메서드에 있는 개체를 찾는 요소 트리를 탐색 하는 이벤트를 발생 하는 대신,는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.

trans-unit.source: The event handlers attached to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> contain the command logic.
trans-unit.target: 에 연결 된 이벤트 처리기는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> 명령 논리를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> 발생 시키는 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> 발생 시키는 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 특성 사용

trans-unit.source: \<*object* *property*="*predefinedCommandName*"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* *property*="*predefinedCommandName*"/>

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- 또는 -

trans-unit.source: \<*object* *property*="*predefinedClassName*.*predefinedCommandName*"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* *property*="*predefinedClassName*.*predefinedCommandName*"/>

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- 또는 -

trans-unit.source: \<*object* *property*="{ *customClassName*.*customCommandName*}"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* *property*="{ *customClassName*.*customCommandName*}"/>

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 값

trans-unit.source: *predefinedClassName*
trans-unit.target: *predefinedClassName*

trans-unit.source: One of the predefined command classes.
trans-unit.target: 미리 정의 된 명령 클래스 중 하나입니다.

trans-unit.source: *predefinedCommandName*
trans-unit.target: *predefinedCommandName*

trans-unit.source: One of the predefined commands.
trans-unit.target: 미리 정의 된 명령 중 하나입니다.

trans-unit.source: *customClassName*
trans-unit.target: *customClassName*

trans-unit.source: A custom class which contains the custom command.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 명령을 포함 하는 사용자 지정 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Custom classes generally require an `xlmns` prefix mapping; see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 클래스는 일반적으로 필요는 `xlmns` 매핑을 앞에; 참조 [XAML 네임 스페이스 및 WPF XAML에 대 한 매핑을 Namespace](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: *customCommandName*
trans-unit.target: *customCommandName*

trans-unit.source: A custom command.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 명령입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Declared name for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 직렬화에 대해 선언된 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The type which is registering the command.
trans-unit.target: 명령을 등록하는 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> class with the specified name and owner type.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 이름과 소유자 형식을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" />가 <see langword="null" />인 경우

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ownerType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ownerType" />가 <see langword="null" />인 경우

trans-unit.source: Declared name for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 직렬화에 대해 선언된 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The type that is registering the command.
trans-unit.target: 명령을 등록할 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: Default input gestures associated with this command.
trans-unit.target: 이 명령과 연결된 기본 입력 제스처입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> class with the specified name, owner type, and collection of gestures.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 이름, 소유자 형식 및 제스처 컬렉션을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" />가 <see langword="null" />인 경우

trans-unit.source: the length of <paramref name="name" /> is zero
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" />의 길이가 0인 경우

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- 또는 -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ownerType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ownerType" />가 <see langword="null" />인 경우

trans-unit.source: A user defined data type.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 정의 데이터 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: The command target.
trans-unit.target: 명령 대상입니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> can execute in its current state.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" />가 현재 상태에서 실행될 수 있는지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the command can execute on the current command target; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 현재 명령 대상에서 명령을 실행할 수 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The actual logic that determines if a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> can execute on the current command target is not contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> methods, rather <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> events which tunnel and bubble through element tree looking for a object with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 있는지 여부를 확인 하는 실제 논리는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> 의 현재 상태에서 실행할 수 있습니다 명령 대상에 포함 되지 않은 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> 메서드 대신 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> 발생는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> 터널을 통해 발생 되는 이벤트 요소 포함 된 개체를 찾는 트리는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is found, then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> attached to <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> 발견 되 면 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> 에 연결 된 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: These handlers supply the programming logic for determining if the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> can execute or not.
trans-unit.target: 여부를 결정 하기에 대 한 프로그래밍 논리를 제공 하는 이러한 처리기는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> 여부 실행할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> events are raised on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> 에서 발생 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> is not set on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> events are raised on the element with keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> 에 설정 되어 있지는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> 키보드 포커스가 있는 요소에 대해 발생 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event handler from a custom implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> 이벤트 처리기를 구현 하는 사용자 지정 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>합니다.

trans-unit.source: `this.Command` in this example is the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.Command%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>.
trans-unit.target: `this.Command` 이 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.Command%2A> 속성에는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the command is not `null`, the command is cast to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 명령이 없으면 `null`, 명령은로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the command is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method is called passing the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 명령이 있는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, 하면 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> 메서드는 전달 된 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If command is not a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, it is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute%2A> method is called passing the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 명령을 없으면는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute%2A> 메서드는 전달 된 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method returns `true`, then the control is enabled; otherwise, the control is disable.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> 메서드 반환 `true`, 다음 컨트롤은 사용할 수 있습니다; 그렇지 않은 경우 컨트롤을 사용 하지 않도록 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" />가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 또는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />가 아닌 경우

trans-unit.source: Occurs when changes to the command source are detected by the command manager.
trans-unit.target: 명령 관리자가 명령 소스에 대한 변경 내용을 감지하는 경우 발생합니다.

trans-unit.source: These changes often affect whether the command should execute on the current command target.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 변경 내용은 대개 현재 명령 대상에서 명령을 실행해야 하는지 여부에 영향을 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> listens for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event, which is raised by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> 에 대 한 수신 대기 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> 이벤트에 의해 발생 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event is raised whenever conditions are met that may change the whether the command should execute, such as a change in keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> 이벤트는 조건이 충족 될 때마다 발생 여부를 변경할 수 있는 키보드 포커스 변경에에서 같은 명령을 실행 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the command receives the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event, it raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecuteChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 명령의 받을 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> 발생 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecuteChanged> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Generally, the command source will listen for this event and query the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> by way of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트와 쿼리 명령 소스 수신할 일반적으로 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> 통해는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: Most command sources will disable themselves if the command cannot be executed, as part of their command binding.
trans-unit.target: 대부분의 명령 소스 명령이 없습니다 실행할 수 있으면 해당 명령 바인딩의 일환으로 비활성화 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: An example of this is when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> grays itself out when the command cannot be executed.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 예는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 명령을 실행할 수 없는 경우 회색으로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: In some situations, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> is unaware of a change in conditions that alters the ability of a command to execute.
trans-unit.target: 일부 경우에는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> 은 실행할 명령의 수를 변경 하는 조건 변경을 인식 하지 못합니다.

trans-unit.source: In these cases, you can force the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> to raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> method, this will in turn cause the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecuteChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 경우에 적용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> 발생 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> 호출 하 여 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> 메서드, 이렇게 하면는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> 시키려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecuteChanged> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event handler from a custom implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> 이벤트 처리기를 구현 하는 사용자 지정 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>합니다.

trans-unit.source: `this.Command` in this example is the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.Command%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>.
trans-unit.target: `this.Command` 이 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.Command%2A> 속성에는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the command is not `null`, the command is cast to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 명령이 없으면 `null`, 명령은로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the command is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method is called passing the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 명령이 있는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, 하면 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> 메서드는 전달 된 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If command is not a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, it is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute%2A> method is called passing the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 명령을 없으면는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute%2A> 메서드는 전달 된 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method returns `true`, then the control is enabled; otherwise, the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> 메서드 반환 `true`, 다음 컨트롤은 사용할 수 있습니다; 그렇지 않은 경우 컨트롤이 비활성화 되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: User defined parameter to be passed to the handler.
trans-unit.target: 처리기에 전달되는 사용자 정의 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Element at which to begin looking for command handlers.
trans-unit.target: 명령 처리기를 찾을 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> on the current command target.
trans-unit.target: 현재 명령 대상에서 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" />를 실행합니다.

trans-unit.source: The actual logic that executes the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is not contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 실행 하는 실제 논리는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> 에 포함 되지 않은 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> events, which tunnel and bubble through the element tree looking for an object with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> 발생는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> 이벤트와 개체를 찾는 트리 터널 및 요소를 통해 버블링 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is found, then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> attached to <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> 발견 되 면 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> 에 연결 된 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: These handlers supply the programming logic that performs the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 수행 하는 프로그래밍 논리를 제공 하는 이러한 처리기는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> events are raised on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> 에서 발생 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> is not set on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> events are raised on the element with keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> 에 설정 되어 있지는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> 키보드 포커스가 있는 요소에 대해 발생 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example is from a custom implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> sample.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제는 사용자 지정 구현에서 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> 샘플.

trans-unit.source: `this.Command` in this example is the Command property on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>.
trans-unit.target: `this.Command` 이 예제 명령 속성에는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the command is not null, the command is cast to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 이 명령은 캐스팅 된 명령은 null 이면는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If it is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> method is called passing the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, 하면 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> 메서드는 전달는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the command is not a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, it is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.Execute%2A> method is called passing the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 명령이 없는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.Execute%2A> 메서드는 전달 된 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" />가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 또는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />가 아닌 경우

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputGesture" /> objects that are associated with this command.
trans-unit.target: 이 명령과 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputGesture" /> 개체의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The input gestures.
trans-unit.target: 입력 제스처입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 새 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the command.
trans-unit.target: 명령 이름을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the command.
trans-unit.target: 명령 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used when referencing a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 참조할 때 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> 에서 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type that is registered with the command.
trans-unit.target: 명령에 등록된 형식을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The type of the command owner.
trans-unit.target: 명령 소유자의 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: Data used by the command.
trans-unit.target: 명령에 사용된 데이터입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the command does not require data to be passed, this object can be set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 명령에서 데이터를 전달할 필요가 없으면 이 개체를 <see langword="null" />로 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this members, see <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버에 대한 설명은 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute(System.Object)" />를 참조하십시오.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this command can be executed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 명령을 실행할 수 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그러지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Data used by the command.
trans-unit.target: 명령에 사용된 데이터입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the command does not require data to be passed, this object can be set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 명령에서 데이터를 전달할 필요가 없으면 이 개체를 <see langword="null" />로 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this members, see <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.Execute(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버에 대한 설명은 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.Execute(System.Object)" />를 참조하십시오.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 참고 항목
